data.description: Arrays as objects, with set methods
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module allows you to manipulate arrays as objects, calling
    methods on those objects. It also includes various set methods, both
    using method names or overloaded operators. Lastly, it uses the
    Want.pm module so that proper method chaining can be used.

    The name Set::Array was chosen because it acts as both an Array and
    a Set.
